pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Pluggable, composable, unopinionated modules for building a Wayland compositor.
wlroots implements a huge variety of Wayland compositor features and implements them right. By using wlroots, you get high performance, excellent hardware compatibility, broad support for many wayland interfaces, and comfortable development tools.
wlroots is developed under the direction of the gui-wm/sway project.

use.flag: Enable support for rootless session via elogind
Use xcb-icccm (from x11-libs/xcb-util-wm) util library for improved Xwayland introspection
Enable support for rootless session via sys-auth/seatd
Enable support for handling input/output devices through x11-libs/libxcb
